name: Native Flora 199
description:
The "native flora" series [1] is created by repeatedly sampling from an L-system [2] that I implemented in R by writing the flametree package [3]. I'm very fond of this system: the pieces it creates tend to be quite gentle, and remind me of an earlier stage in my life when I spent a lot of my time gardening.

Sources:

[1] https://art.djnavarro.net/gallery/native-flora/
[2] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/L-system
[3] https://flametree.djnavarro.net/

Author:
